alert.note: Alert for Dale; Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 5:48PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Dale and southwestern Henry Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 548 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Midland City, or near Dothan, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ozark, Headland, Midland City, Newton, Pinckard, Grimes, Napier Field, Bells Crossroads, Hunt Field, Waterford, Dill, Kirkland Crossroads, Mabson, Arguta, Snells Crossroads, Ewell, Dale County Lake, Phillips Crossroads, Sylvan Grove and Skipperville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
